name: cpp-codelens
description: A VSCode extension that adds CodeLens to C++ files.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.emptyTe.description: Text displayed above an symbol when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.singula.description: Template text displayed above an symbol with exactly one reference.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.pluralT.description: Template text displayed above an symbol with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.file.en.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for file symbol

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.file.em.description: Text displayed above an file when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.file.si.description: Template text displayed above an file with exactly one reference.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.file.pl.description: Template text displayed above an file with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.module..description: Enable or disable CodeLens for module symbol
Text displayed above an module when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an module with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an module with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.namespa.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for namespace symbol
Text displayed above an namespace when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an namespace with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an namespace with multiple references.

Text displayed above an package when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an package with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an package with multiple references.

Text displayed above an class when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.class.s.description: Template text displayed above an class with exactly one reference.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.class.p.description: Template text displayed above an class with multiple references.

Text displayed above an field when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.field.p.description: Template text displayed above an field with multiple references.

Text displayed above an constructor when no references are found. Leave empty to disable the annotation.
Template text displayed above an constructor with exactly one reference.
Template text displayed above an constructor with multiple references.

cpp-codelens.codelens.references.enum.en.description: Enable or disable CodeLens for enum symbol

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
